title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 9
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 9:

We have 33 titles in this upload:

-  Ahmed - The Thistle and the Drone; How America's War on Terror Became a Global War on Tribal Islam (2013)

-  Alford - Allied Looting in World War II; Thefts of Art, Manuscripts, Stamps and Jewelry in Europe (2011)

-  Armour-Hileman - Singing to the Dead; a Missioner's Life among Refugees from Burma (2002)

-  Benjamin - Drone Warfare; Killing by Remote Control (2012)

-  Bergen & Tiedemann - The Year of the Drone; an Analysis of U.S. Drone Strikes in Pakistan, 2004-2010 (2010)

-  Bloom - Foundations of Psychological Profiling; Terrorism, Espionage, and Deception (2013)

-  Domscheit-Berg - Inside WikiLeaks; My Time with Julian Assange at the World's Most Dangerous Website (2011)

-  Downes - Targeting Civilians in War (2008)

-  Environmental Assessment of the Gaza Strip following the Escalation of Hostilities in Dec 2008 - Jan  2009 (UNEP, 2009)

-  Grover - Child Soldier Victims of Genocidal Forcible Transfer (2012)

-  Hastedt (Ed.) - Spies, Wiretaps, and Secret Operations; an Encyclopedia of American Espionage (2011)

-  Hedges & Al-Arian - Collateral Damage, America's War against Iraqi Civilians (2008)

-  Herzog - A Short History of Nuclear Folly; Mad Scientists, Dithering Nazis, Lost Nukes, and Catastrophic Cover-Ups (2012)

-  HRW - Isolated in Yunnan; Kachin Refugees from Burma in China's Yunnan Province (2012)

-  Jambrek (Ed.) - Crimes Committed by Totalitarian Regimes (2008)

-  Kaltman - Under the Heel of the Dragon; Islam, Racism, Crime, and the Uighur in China (2007)

-  Kohut & Vilella - Historical Dictionary of the Dirty Wars, 2e (2010)

-  Mazzetti - The Way of the Knife; the CIA, a Secret Army, and a War at the Ends of the Earth (2013)

-  Morris - Apartheid; the History of Apartheid, Race Versus Reason - South Africa from 1948 to 1994 (2012)

-  Neer - Napalm; an American Biography (2013)

-  Polakow-Suransky - The Unspoken Alliance, Israel's Secret Relationship with Apartheid South Africa (2010)

-  Roberts - Blacked Out; Government Secrecy in the Information Age (2006)

-  Rosefielde & Mills - Masters of Illusion; American Leadership in the Media Age (2007)

-  Rosen - Aftermath; Following the Bloodshed of America's Wars in the Muslim World (2010)

-  Scahill - Dirty Wars; the World Is a Battlefield (2013)

-  Smith - Seeds of Deception; Exposing Industry and Government Lies about the Safety of the Genetically Engineered Foods (2003)

-  Steinberg - Burma-Myanmar; What Everyone Needs to Know (2010)

-  Taylor - State Building in Putin's Russia; Policing and Coercion after Communism (2011)

-  The Constitution in Crisis; the Downing Street Minutes and Deception, Manipulation, Torture, Retribution, Coverups in the Iraq War, .. (2006)

-  Turse - Kill Anything That Moves; the Real American War in Vietnam (2013)

-  Webb - Dark Alliance, The CIA the Contras and the Crack Cocaine Explosion (1998)

-  Wilcox - Scorched Earth; Legacies of Chemical Warfare in Vietnam (2011)
